name: Just Bros
description:
JUST BROS


Just Bros is a mature adult erotic NSFW gay sim where you explore the world of gay dating life. The game will featured at least 4 planned main love interest for you to pursue. While trying to win over your preferred eye candy, you will be meeting other unique encounters which may blossom into one night hook ups. Just Bros is is lighthearted erotic which absolutely no intriguing mystery to uncover. You are just a hunky guy looking to charm your way into pants and participate in your wildest fantasy hook-ups.

(The is a working in progress VN with everything constantly expanding and changing with each update)

FEATURES:

  • At least 4 potential life partners to pursue
  • Potential one night stand with a stranger at the end of each chapter
  • Multiple routes and endings for replayability
  •  Different variety of men e.g. races, hariness, tribe etc
  • Light-hearted kinky storyline
  • Nudes and naughty scenes

SOME OF THE GUYS:

Jasper, Your nudist Roommate with a naughty Secret


Maxen, Your mom's ex who used to be your father figure

Ryder, You childhood best buddy

Ellis, A stoic, quiet schoolmate

And many more to come

Where to Play?:

If you are interested in my work, you can support me on www.patreon.com/ellofatdog for just the price of a cup of coffee a month where you will have access to Just Bros and many other mini visual novels already out and playable! 

Other visual novels can be found here: https://ellofatdog.itch.io/totallyjustbros
